metadata.title: CVE-2014-6052 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The HandleRFBServerMessage function in libvncclient/rfbproto.c inLibVNCServer 0.9.9 and earlier does not check certain malloc return values,which allows remote VNC servers to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) or possibly execute arbitrary code by specifying a large screen sizein a (1) FramebufferUpdate, (2) ResizeFrameBuffer, or (3)PalmVNCReSizeFrameBuffer message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6052` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

italc-client - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
italc-management-console - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
italc-master - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
libitalccore - 1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: italc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.0.1+dfsg1-1').
